data.title: Personal Health Services
data.meta_description: Through responsible budgeting and thoughtful planning, Kent County government is committed to providing resources and services that promote a high quality of life for the entire community.
data.text:
For Providers

Sexually Transmitted Infections

General Information

Most Recent STI testing and Treatment Guidelines

CDC STI Testing and Treatment Guidelines Mobile App

Fax to Report Sexually Rransmitted Infections & Treatment - (616) 632-7185

HIV

HIV Case Report

Syphilis

The State of Michigan handles disease investigation for syphilis. To refer a patient for syphilis treatment, please call (616) 632-7171. Kent County will need patient demographics and most recent labs to determine treatment.

Hepatitis C

In 2021, Medicaid removed the need for prior authorization in order for patients to recieve Hepatitis C. treatment. Learn more Â»

Tuberculosis

Please fill out the referral form for patients with a positive TB test (IGRA or TST) who reside in Kent County and fax to (616) 632-7185. If a patient is having active TB symptoms or is TB treatment is being initiated, call (616) 632-7190.

TST Certification Classes
